flawed_nl_solution:
The age of Jeremy three years from now will be 40+3 = <<40+3=43>>43 years
Since Sebastian age is four years more than Jeremy's, Sebastian is currently 40+4 = 47 years.
In three years, Sebastian will be 47+3 = <<47+3=50>>50 years old
The total age of Jeremy and Sebastian in three years will be 50+43 = <<50+43=93>>93
If the total age of Jeremy, Sebastian and Sophia in three years is 150, then Sophia's age in three years will be 150-93 = <<150-93=57>>57

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 44, not 47. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
